Package org.apache.shale.faces

This package contains the internal JavaServer Faces implementation of the core framework.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ShaleConstants ShaleConstants are manifest constants defining global identifiers shared across the internal implementation of the controller.
ShalePropertyResolver Shale-specific PropertyResolver for evaluating JavaServer Faces value binding and method binding expressions.
ShaleVariableResolver Shale-specific VariableResolver for evaluating JavaServer Faces value binding and method binding expressions.
 

Package org.apache.shale.faces Description

This package contains the internal JavaServer Faces implementation of the core framework. Application developers will not need to utilize any APIs defined in this package directly.
